Package net.tnemc.menu.core.builder

Class IconBuilder

java.lang.Object
net.tnemc.menu.core.builder.IconBuilder
public class IconBuilder extends Object
Builder class for creating instances of the Icon and StateIcon classes.
Since:
1.5.0.0
Author:
creatorfromhell

    • withPdcApplication

      public IconBuilder withPdcApplication(boolean pdcApplication)
      Sets whether the PDC application is enabled for this icon builder. This enables better protection against exploits.
      Parameters:
      pdcApplication - The boolean value indicating whether the PDC application is enabled.
      Returns:
      This IconBuilder instance for method chaining.
